description: I follow a structured, seven-phase workflow that removes uncertainty and keeps projects organized. This system ensures nothing gets missed, deadlines are met, and you always know what's happening.

phases.title: Discovery & Requirements Gathering
phases.goal: Understanding your business, goals, and project needs before any code is written.

steps.title: Initial consultation call
steps.details: We discuss your business, target audience, competition, and what success looks like for this project.

steps.title: Gathering necessary materials
steps.details: You provide brand guidelines, content, designs, system access, and other required materials.

steps.title: Defining scope and constraints
steps.details: We establish project boundaries, features, budget, timeline, and technical requirements.

steps.title: Setting clear expectations
steps.details: I outline communication methods, workflow, responsibilities, and deliverables.

phases.title: Documentation & Planning
phases.goal: Creating a written roadmap for the project.

steps.title: Requirements documentation
steps.details: A detailed document outlining all features and technical specifications.

steps.title: Information architecture and sitemap
steps.details: Mapping site structure, navigation, and page relationships.

steps.title: Technical decisions and architecture
steps.details: Choosing technologies, integrations, hosting, and explaining decisions clearly.

steps.title: Project timeline and milestones
steps.details: A realistic schedule with milestones, deliverables, and review points.

phases.title: Design Phase
phases.goal: Creating visual design and user experience before development.

steps.title: Wireframes and mockups
steps.details: Low and high-fidelity designs for layout and visuals.

steps.title: User experience decisions
steps.details: Decisions on navigation, interactions, and user flows.

steps.title: Design feedback and revisions
steps.details: Client feedback is reviewed and improvements are made.

steps.title: Design approval and sign-off
steps.details: Final approval before moving to development.

phases.title: Development Phase
phases.goal: Building the website with clean, scalable code.

steps.title: Clean, scalable code
steps.details: Modern frameworks, organized code, and best practices.

steps.title: Performance-focused implementation
steps.details: Optimized speed, images, and minimal dependencies.

steps.title: SEO-ready foundation
steps.details: Proper structure, meta tags, responsiveness, and SEO practices.

steps.title: Regular progress updates
steps.details: Weekly updates and real-time staging links.

phases.title: Testing & Review
phases.goal: Ensuring everything works perfectly before launch.

steps.title: Cross-browser and device testing
steps.details: Testing on all major browsers and devices.

steps.title: Performance and accessibility checks
steps.details: Load time optimization and accessibility audits.

steps.title: Bug fixing and refinement
steps.details: Fixing issues and polishing interactions.

steps.title: Client review and feedback
steps.details: Final testing and feedback before launch.

phases.title: Deployment & Launch
phases.goal: Moving the website safely to production.

steps.title: Secure deployment process
steps.details: SSL setup, security headers, and production configuration.

steps.title: Final pre-launch checks
steps.details: Verifying functionality, analytics, and integrations.

steps.title: Go-live support
steps.details: Monitoring performance during launch.

steps.title: Documentation handoff
steps.details: Guides for content updates and system access.

steps.title: Monitoring and maintenance
steps.details: Performance monitoring, updates, and bug fixes.

steps.title: Content and feature updates
steps.details: Adding features and updating content as needed.

steps.title: Technical consultation
steps.details: Guidance on improvements and integrations.

steps.title: Long-term partnership
steps.details: Ongoing collaboration for continued success.

closing_title: This process keeps projects on track
closing_statement: This process keeps projects organized, on track, and stress-free with full transparency.
